election_record.label: Massachusetts 1807 Lieutenant Governor

sub_unit.name: Thompson Pond and Shaker Settlement
sub_unit.note: There were no votes in Thompson Pond and Shaker Settlement.

sub_unit.name: Buckland
sub_unit.note: The votes from Buckland were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Wendell
sub_unit.note: The votes from Wendell were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Dixmont
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Dixmont.

sub_unit.name: Sedgwick
sub_unit.note: The votes for Sedgwick were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Surry
sub_unit.note: The votes from Surry were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Ballstown
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Ballstown.

sub_unit.name: Cushing
sub_unit.note: The votes from Cushing were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Jefferson
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Jefferson.
Jefferson was Incorporated February 24, 1807.

sub_unit.name: Montville
sub_unit.note: The votes from Montville were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Burlington
sub_unit.note: The votes from Burlington were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Gilead
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Gilead.

sub_unit.name: Hartford
sub_unit.note: "No returns." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Hiram
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Hiram.

sub_unit.name: Lovell
sub_unit.note: "No returns." Original Election Returns.

sub_unit.name: Newry
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Newry.

sub_unit.name: Wareham
sub_unit.note: Town Records. Wareham, Book 2. 10, lists 56 votes for Levi Lincoln.

sub_unit.name: Plantation No. 4
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Plantation No. 4.

sub_unit.name: Plantation No. 5
sub_unit.note: There were no votes recorded in Plantation No. 5.

sub_unit.name: Worcester
sub_unit.note: The scattering votes are listed in the Original Election Returns as being for "William Stearns and others" but no votes are specifically designated as being cast for William Stearns.

sub_unit.name: New Braintree
sub_unit.note: The votes from New Braintree were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Worcester
sub_unit.note: The Original Election Returns list only 7 scattering votes in Worcester.
